Hierarchy For Package org.apache.cayenne.conn

Package Hierarchies:
  • All Packages

Class Hierarchy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cayenne.conn.ConnectionWrapper (implements java.sql.Connection)
    • org.apache.cayenne.conn.ContainerPoolFactory (implements javax.naming.spi.ObjectFactory)
    • org.apache.cayenne.conn.DataSourceInfo (implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable, org.apache.cayenne.util.XMLSerializable)
    • org.apache.cayenne.conn.DriverDataSource (implements javax.sql.DataSource)
    • org.apache.cayenne.conn.PoolDataSource (implements javax.sql.ConnectionPoolDataSource)
    • org.apache.cayenne.conn.PooledConnectionImpl (implements javax.sql.PooledConnection)
    • org.apache.cayenne.conn.PoolManager (implements javax.sql.ConnectionEventListener, javax.sql.DataSource, org.apache.cayenne.di.ScopeEventListener)
